title: Long-life sodium-sulfur batteries enabled by super-sodiophilic seeds
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02996H, Paper
Jiarui He, Amruth Bhargav, Arumugam Manthiram
Sodium–metal batteries (SMBs) are an appealing sustainable low–cost alternative to lithium–metal batteries due to their high theoretical capacity (1,165 mA h g−1) and abundance of sodium. However, the practical viability of SMBs is...
